price: ߞߙߎߞߊ߫ ߡߊ߫ ߞߴߦߋ߲߬ ߡߍ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߘߴߊ߬ ߘߍ߬ߡߍ߲߬ ߣߌ߫ ߊߟߊ߫ ߕߍ߫ ߸ ߊ߬ ߘߏ߲߬ ߡߊ߫ ߞߴߊ߬ ߖߍ߬ߘߍ߫ ߘߍ߬ߡߍ߲߬ߓߊ߯ ߘߌ߫
arabic: وَلَمۡ تَكُن لَّهُۥ فِئَةٞ يَنصُرُونَهُۥ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَمَا كَانَ مُنتَصِرًا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: walam takun lahu fi-atun yanṣurūnahu min dūni al-lahi wamā kāna muntaṣiran
